RecommendationSystem.NewsAgencyScraper.NewsAgencyScraper.pipelines module

class RecommendationSystem.NewsAgencyScraper.NewsAgencyScraper.pipelines.ScraperPipeline

Bases: object

process_item(item, spider) → Item

Stores the articles and comments in the database This method is called every time an item is processed :param item: Article item with information about the article and the comments that are published under the article :param spider: :return: Unmodified item. The data are only extracted and stored in the database.
